nodes.bodyText: I know this whole module is tests but it could be nice to declare all these dependencies as test scope. Wdyt?

I know this whole module is tests but it could be nice to declare all these dependencies as test scope. Wdyt?

I see some/a lot of code in common in this class, AbstractPMMLTreeTest and AbstractPMMLRegressionTest.
After this PR the code of these classes is even more generic.
What do you think about create a common AbstractPMMLTest to be extended?

@danielezonca
Wdyt @jiripetrlik ? Would you eventually create a ticket and do that refactoring? It would really help if, for some bad luck, in the future, with many more models, there would be another "breaking change" like this

@gitgabrio @danielezonca
Yes, I agree. I've created a ticket for it: DROOLS-5389
